version_description: Minor bug fixes to route maps and favourites.

- iOS 7 optimisation
- 'My Journey' fares for Bristol area (where fare data is available)
- Minor bug fixes

- Stop alerts
- Naming / personalising of favourite stops
- Earlier / later times on bus timetables
- Minor bug fixes
Information and links to our new m-tickets app (not available in all First Bus operating areas).
Minor tweaks
iOS 8 bug fixes
Minor changes

Design changes
Bug fixes
Timetables bug fix for iOS 7 users.
Minor bug fixes
Minor changes and bug fixes.

- Journey planner
- Fares and tickets amends
- Location bug fixes

- In-app notifications
- Minor bug fixes
Minor bug fixes

- Changes to Cornwall and Somerset local operator areas
- New provider for Next Bus data
Minor changes

Download our new First Bus app.
- Easier and faster to use.
- Intuitive door-to-door multi-modal journey planner.
- Quick access to favourite bus stops including live bus times.

Download our new First Bus app.
- Improved performance and efficiency.
- Improved access to near-by bus stops including live bus times.
- Easier and faster to use.

We’ve listened carefully to your comments about our new app, and this update adds the features you've told us are important to you.

Now you can:
- Enter a bus number to quickly check its route and times.
- Favourite the bus routes you use the most.
- Re-name and reorder your favourites in the Plan section.
- Enter place names whilst using the Plan map to jump to that location.

Please keep sharing your feedback with us! All your suggestions help us to keep improving the First Bus app.

We’ve listened carefully to your comments about our app, and this update adds further improvements.
> Improved departure boards
> Bug fixes and minor usability enhancements

Please keep sharing your feedback with us! All your suggestions help us to keep improving the First Bus app.

We listened to you and we're working to continuously improve the app. Following your feedback:
- Saving bus stops, bus routes and train stations to your favourites is now easier than ever, giving you improved access from the dashboard and map.
- Departure board headers now have an improved design and a more streamlined navigation.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We've listened to your feedback and made improvements to make door to door journey planning and buying your First Bus mTicket even easier.

Recent improvements in this update include:
- First Bus service only filter
- Tickets displayed in chronological order of purchase

If you have any further feedback please send it to App@firstgroup.com

Introducing First Bus mTickets!

- You can now plan your journey and buy First Bus mTickets all in one app
- Buy your tickets using Visa, Mastercard, PayPal and Google Pay
- Gift Child and Student mTickets
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

We keep improving the app based on your comments and feedback. In this release:
- The info tab was redesigned for easier access to app support and customer service.
- The app is now fully optimised for iPhone X.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

We keep improving the app based on your feedback. In this release:
- Access to timetables was added to bus stop and bus route screens for First Bus services.
- We made filtering the train station screen clearer and easier.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.

We keep improving the app based on your comments and feedback. In this release:
- The info tab was redesigned for easier access to app support and customer service.
- The app is now fully optimised for iPhone X.
- Minor bug fixes and improvements.
Minor bug fixes.
Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Introducing First Bus mTickets!

- You can now plan your journey and buy First Bus mTickets all in one app
- Buy your tickets using Visa, Mastercard, PayPal and Google Pay
- Gift Child and Student mTickets
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

We’ve listened to your feedback and made improvements to make door to door journey planning and buying your First Bus mTicket even easier.

New updates in this release include:
- Switching between real time information and your mTicket is easier
- Bug fixes including the issue of being logged out on a regular basis
- Improvements to how real-time bus information is displayed

If you have any further feedback please send it to App@firstgroup.com
